{% set ns = namespace() %} {% set ns.solutions = [] %} {% set ns.industries = [] %} {% set ns.ai_solutions = [] %} {# Load and parse all supplementary page data #} {% for yaml_file in [ 'api-documentation.yaml', 'product-documentation.yaml', 'technical-documentation.yaml', 'user-manuals.yaml', 'training-documentation.yaml', 'sops.yaml', 'quality-management.yaml', 'knowledge-base.yaml', 'ai-chatbot.yaml', 'ai-technical-writer.yaml', 'doc-chatbots.yaml', 'custom-ai-content-prompts.yaml', 'documentation-from-video.yaml', 'content-management.yaml', 'customer-support.yaml', 'release-notes.yaml', 'style-guide.yaml', 'training-materials.yaml', 'data_sheets.yaml', 'ai-documentation.yaml' ] %} {% set file_path = 'src/.data/' + yaml_file %} {% if file_path is file %} {% set page_data = load_yaml(file_path) %} {% if page_data and page_data.0 %} {% set page = page_data.0 %} {% if page.category == 'Solutions' %} {% if 'ai' in page.id.lower() or 'chatbot' in page.id.lower() %} {% set ns.ai_solutions = ns.ai_solutions + [page] %} {% else %} {% set ns.solutions = ns.solutions + [page] %} {% endif %} {% endif %} {% endif %} {% endif %} {% endfor %} {# Load industry data #} {% for industry_file in [ 'industries/saas.yaml', 'industries/manufacturing.yaml', 'industries/energy.yaml', 'industries/government.yaml', 'industries/compliance.yaml', 'industries/it-services.yaml' ] %} {% set file_path = 'src/.data/' + industry_file %} {% if file_path is file %} {% set page_data = load_yaml(file_path) %} {% if page_data and page_data.0 %} {% set ns.industries = ns.industries + [page_data.0] %} {% endif %} {% endif %} {% endfor %}
